title: 1911년 Chorost 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Chorost. 판결일: 1911-11-15. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Aron Chorost v. Louis Teitelbaum
**판결일**: 1911-11-15
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 147 A.D. 910
- 132 N.Y.S. 1124

## 판결문 요약


Judgment of the Municipal Court reversed and new trial ordered, costs to abide the event. As defendant admitted an indebtedness of eighteen dollars, judgment should not have been entered dismissing plaintiffs complaint. In view of the confused character of the testimony given upon the trial of this action, we think, in the interest of justice, that instead of requiring defendant .to stipulate for judgment for the stun admitted to be due, with costs, a new trial should be ordered, when perhaps the testimony may be presented in a more intelligible manner. Jenks, P. J., Burr, Thomas, Carr and Woodward, JJ., concurred.
...
